entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h before morning. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the morning then steady. POP 60%
entry.summary: Light snow ending early in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the morning then steady. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
